name: Bacterium (itch) (Nate Bramble)
description:
Bacterium is an Asteroids-like shooter mini game. You play a vaccine tasked with injecting as much bacteria as you can before it spreads too much.

As I learn the ins and outs of video game development I am using online tutorials to build some basic games. I used a tutorial to create the game 'Space Rocks' in the GameMaker 2 Studio engine. Using that basic game from the tutorial as a prototype I went back and redesigned the artwork, added some animation to make it more my own.

Bacterium is the first game I completed from start to finish and reflects the cartoony style I love to draw in. 

See more of my cartoon work and other projects on my portfolio site:

NateBramble.com
